THREAT LANDSCAPE

The reality of moderncyber threats

Cyber attacks are continuous, global, and increasingly complex. Understanding the threat landscape is essential for anyone working in security operations.

Threat activity happening right now

Live visualization of ongoing cyber activity across the globe.

Loading live threat map…
Modern Threats

Modern cyber threats are persistent, not occasional

Attacks are continuous

Threat activity runs at all hours — not isolated events.

Automated and repeated

Most threats are scripted and will try again and again.

Missed alerts cause damage

The risk rises when signals are ignored or lost.

Common Attack Types

Common types of threats SOC teams monitor

Malware & Ransomware

Malicious software designed to disrupt, encrypt, or steal data.

Phishing & Credential Abuse

Attempts to gain unauthorized access using social engineering.

Brute Force & Automated Attacks

Repeated login attempts using bots and scripts.

Insider & Privilege Misuse

Abuse of legitimate access, intentional or accidental.

Command & Control Activity

Infected systems communicating with attacker infrastructure.
